result.title: Observatory of key IWT Networks enablers: TEN-T developments, port automation, energy and legal issues
result.description: Observatory setup and basic functions including TEN-T projects related to inland shipping, identifying opportunities for collaboration and the uptake of common actions. Observatory upgrade including (a) Trends in port automation affecting IWT, (b) Review of legal issues particularly for cross-border operation and support strategies and (c) Legislation and policy. A report will include observatory governance and structure, mission, and major sections description with all portal functionalities set. Observatory final version will have a report on updated content, and stakeholder’s assessment.

result.title: The HEIR facilitators package: MVP
result.description: The HEIR MVP will be delivered in M12 and will include a first version of i the tool for monitoring the underlying health systems and analysing in realtime the vulnerabilities of them ii the interactive subsystem for forensics analysis of the health systems iii the Novel machine learning models for anomaly detection and threat classification and iv the innovative HEIR collaborative framework which will incorporates modern blockchain technologiesThe demonstrator will be presented in a short report
